stories.text:
There must be many people who feel guilty about owning crypto assets because of its environmental and societal impacts.

In this thread, let's discuss ways in which people can get rid of their crypto assets, and at the same time contribute to crypto's downfall or devaluation, or to offset the impacts somehow.

This is not intended as a discussion about whether or not crypto is good or bad.
stories.title: Ask HN: What to do with crypto assets if you feel guilty?
Space Shapes Collaboration: Using Anthropology to Break Silos
Microsoft PowerToys gets a new Always On Top feature and launcher web search
